translations: v.暗示（hint 的现在分词）；微调；隐示

phrs.translation: 领会别人的暗示；接受暗示

sentences.sentence: Researchers recently found kimberlite deposits hinting at the existence of diamonds.
sentences.translation: 研究人员最近发现了金伯利岩矿床，这暗示着钻石的存在。

sentences.sentence: Not only had Ed insulted this man by hinting that he was a garbageman, but he had obviously neglected to tip him.
sentences.translation: 艾德不仅侮辱了这个人，暗示他是一个垃圾清洁工，而且显然没有给他小费。
